title: Kathe Ille Pathukalam
overview: Dynamic musical duo, Havoc Brothers (which comprises of Mathan and Naveen), are making a splash in the film industry. The movie marks the Havoc Brothers` inaugural leap into cinema. Promising a thrilling fusion of music, drama, and action, the film epitomises the duo`s versatility and charisma. Backed by a compelling storyline and a stellar cast, including Havoc Mathan`s direction.
